languages.text: "Мой господин! Помните, что говорил вам лекарь? Воздержание от излишеств есть наилучшее лекарство от хворей! Боюсь, сегодня вы снова нарушили все его предписания".

traits.locale_text: "Мой господин! Помните, что говорил вам лекарь? Воздержание от излишеств есть наилучшее лекарство от хворей! Боюсь, сегодня вы снова нарушили все его предписания".

languages.text: "My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."
languages.original_text: "Мой господин! Помните, что говорил вам лекарь? Воздержание от излишеств есть наилучшее лекарство от хворей! Боюсь, сегодня вы снова нарушили все его предписания".

traits.locale_text: "My lord! Do you remember what the physician told you? Temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

"My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

languages.text: “领主大人！别忘了医生是怎么告诫您的——节制是治疗疾病最好的药物！恐怕您今天又违背了医嘱。”
languages.original_text: "My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

traits.locale_text: “领主大人！别忘了医生是怎么告诫您的——节制是治疗疾病最好的药物！恐怕您今天又违背了医嘱。”

languages.text: «¡Mi señor! ¡Recuerde lo que le dijo el galeno: la mejor cura para sus males es la moderación! Me temo que hoy ya ha vuelto a desoír su consejo».
languages.original_text: "My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

traits.locale_text: «¡Mi señor! ¡Recuerde lo que le dijo el galeno: la mejor cura para sus males es la moderación! Me temo que hoy ya ha vuelto a desoír su consejo».

languages.text: "Lordum! Hekim size ne demişti? Rahatsızlıklarınızın en iyi ilacı ölçülü olmaktır! Korkarım ki bugün yine onun isteklerine karşı geldiniz."
languages.original_text: "My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

traits.locale_text: "Lordum! Hekim size ne demişti? Rahatsızlıklarınızın en iyi ilacı ölçülü olmaktır! Korkarım ki bugün yine onun isteklerine karşı geldiniz."

languages.text: 「ご主人様！節度こそが病気の最良の治療だと医者が言っていたことを思い出してください！今日も彼の望みに従わないことを恐れています」
languages.original_text: "My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

traits.locale_text: 「ご主人様！節度こそが病気の最良の治療だと医者が言っていたことを思い出してください！今日も彼の望みに従わないことを恐れています」

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Vous semblez avoir aujourd'hui encore oublié les conseils de votre physicien ! Ne vous a-t-il pas dit que la tempérance était le meilleur remède à vos maux ? »
languages.original_text: "My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie ! Vous semblez avoir aujourd'hui encore oublié les conseils de votre physicien ! Ne vous a-t-il pas dit que la tempérance était le meilleur remède à vos maux ? »

languages.text: "Mein Lord! Bedenkt, was der Arzt gesagt hat: Mäßigung ist die beste Heilung für Eure Gebrechen! Ich fürchte, Ihr habt seine Wünsche heute wieder missachtet."
languages.original_text: "My lord! Remember what the physician told you: temperance is the best cure for your ailments! I fear that you have disobeyed his wishes again today."

traits.locale_text: "Mein Lord! Bedenkt, was der Arzt gesagt hat: Mäßigung ist die beste Heilung für Eure Gebrechen! Ich fürchte, Ihr habt seine Wünsche heute wieder missachtet."
